name: RAISE YOUR ISLAND
description:
Raise your island is a resource management game, where you will have to manage to keep as many citizens alive for as many days as possible.

  • Turn-based game in which your days will be short.
  • Creates constructions to collect resources.
  • Keeps your citizens alive for as long as possible.
  • Improve your constructions to obtain even more benefits.

You must keep at least one citizen alive to survive the day, each citizen needs a certain amount of food to survive. 

Thanks to that, you collect taxes (gold) that will help you improve your buildings and earn more profit.

  • You only need the mouse to play, with the right click you can build, delete, upgrade, etc.
  • The left click is used to select the constructions to view their information panel.

  • The constructions last x number of days and you can visually see how many days are left for their destruction.
  • All constructions can be repaired and harvesters can be upgraded for higher profits.
  • Every day the construction panel is updated with 5 possible options, where you can select each one for X amount of resources.
  • Every x days you will be able to buy a house and get more citizens.
  • Possibility to modify the terrain.
  • New biomes (desert, swamps, snow) with different benefits.
  • Attack of dragons and Vikings.
  • Natural disasters.
  • New resources.
  • New constructions (mines, harbors, trade, defensive, bonuses).
  • Map that is procedurally generated.
  • Different levels of difficulty.
